meet Duckie Duckie is a grey tuxedo who loves belly rubs treats and his little brother Birdie PERIOD Duckuie can play fetch with his toys and his 





PISCATAWAY N.J PERIOD  West Virginia took advantage of a quick start in the first quarter and brought a  lead over Rutgers into the second half PERIOD

The Mountaineers used a balanced attack in the opening quarter to find the end zone twice PERIOD



After Mark Rodgers muffed the opening kickoff and only returned it to the 14yard line WVU made quick work of the long field PERIOD



WVU drove down the field in just  led by a 28yard completion from Jarrett Brown to Jock Sanders and a 37yard run by Brown on the following play PERIOD



On the fifth play of the drive Noel Devine took his first carry into the end zone for the sixyard touchdown to take a  lead PERIOD



On Rutgers first drive kicker San San Te booted a 38yard field goal to cut the lead to  PERIOD



West Virginia finished off its third drive with another touchdown this one was a oneyard fullback dive from Ryan Clarke to give the Mountaineers a  advantage nearing the end of the first quarter PERIOD



From that point both defenses began to take over PERIOD A first down in the second down was hard to come by PERIOD In fact it didnt happen until the  mark in the half for WVU PERIOD



The Mountaineer defense held Rutgers offense to five threeandouts in the quarter PERIOD The Scarlet Knights had its initial first down in the second quarter with  seconds left PERIOD



Neither team would score after the first downs though PERIOD



Rutgers was booed off the field after gaining one yard in the second quarter PERIOD



West Virginia gained just two yards in the quarter PERIOD



WVU is 1of7 on third downs PERIOD Rutgers is 1of8 PERIOD



Rutgers has just one yard rushing in the half as well PERIOD
